metadata.title: CVE-2023-41835 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: When a Multipart request is performed but some of the fields exceed themaxStringLength  limit, the upload files will remain instruts.multipart.saveDir  even if the request has been denied.Users are recommended to upgrade to versions Struts 2.5.32 or 6.1.2.2 orStruts 6.3.0.1 or greater, which fixe this issue.

criterions.comment: libstruts1.2-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
